Desc.entry: Society for those interested in local history which meets monthly with speakers, discussions and visits. Archive of materials held at Stocksbridge Library which is available for viewing during Library opening times under the supervision of library staff. Holds a Christmas Carol Supper in December.

Pubs.entry: Newsletter; Booklets; Two books of archive photographs; Various local history books; 2 discs of local census information 1841-1901

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Thurs in the month at 7pm (except Aug & Dec)
